name: Assist24 Help Desk
author: Mauro Cordioli

sections.description:
24 Assist allows you to activate a Help Desk service professional with a few clicks
and manage your help desk even from mobile phones, tablets, desk.

Assist24 multiplies conversions and turns every visitor into a potential customer.
Extremely powerful and customizable, designed for the sale of the network and therefore simple and easy to install and use the best.
The best service for your customers, always available at any time of the navigation adapting to the language of the browser automatically.

Features

  • Chat on line
  • Ticket
  • Call me back
  • Analitycs
  • Calendar To Do – ICAL
  • Drop-dead simple and easy to use
  • Uses latest version of Assist24.it
  • Include Assist24.it in header or footer

Support

  • Supports Assist24.it/Noima.js

Learn more about Assist24.it!
sections.installation:
Installation

*Install and activate plugin ‘Assist24’
*Click on the new A24 button in your left sidebar.
*Click the button to take you to the widget selector at ‘A24 Plugin Options’.
*Enter your ‘A24 Room ID’ or create a new account (app.assist24.it).
*Click the link ‘Save Setting’ and get ready to chat!

Manual Installation
1. Download the plugin ‘el-assist24’ from www.assist24.it, Upload and Activate
2. Visit the “Assist24.it” options page, enter your Assist24.it ID, and done.

For more information, visit the A24 Plugin Homepage.
sections.faq:
To ask a question, visit the A24 Plugin Homepage or contact me.

Learn more about Assist24.it and register on http://app.Assist24.it.

20150310.1

  • Tested with latest version of WP (4.0)
  • Increased minimum version to WP 3.7
  • Implemented version Multilanguage Automatic
  • Completed integration with Calenda To-Do ICal
  • New management features Call Me Back to Mobile
  • Initial release
